question: 抜き出す
sourceMnemonic: You know <ja>抜く</ja> from before, it's to <kanji>extract</kanji>. Then you have <ja>出す</ja> which is to <kanji>remove</kanji>. So, if you extract and remove something, you are moving <vocabulary>to extract</vocabulary> something. By extracting it you are also going <vocabulary>to select</vocabulary> it as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are from <ja>抜く</ja> and <ja>出す</ja>, combined together. Know those two and you'll be able to read this word as well.
